attributes.action: The  ‘Triple Lock’ should be retained by the Governmed.
attributes.additional_details: I as a Pensioner and a widow am already experiencing higher prices on my gas, electricity and food bills, therefore I rely on my state pension to keep apace with inflation.
attributes.background: Keep the ‘Triple Lock’ as they promised to do in their Manifesto.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591161
